document.docAuthor: Sousa, Sandriel Costa, Hernández-García, Luis Manuel & Rousseau, Guillaume Xavier
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Pontoscolex earthworm (Rhinodrilidae, Clitellata) from the Gurupi Biological Reserve, along with records of earthworm species from the Amazon region of Maranhão, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Pontoscolex earthworm (Rhinodrilidae, Clitellata) from the Gurupi Biological Reserve, along with records of earthworm species from the Amazon region of Maranhão, Brazil

mods:name.mods:affiliation: hglm 72 @ gmail. com; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0003 - 1478 - 4953

bibRefCitation.author: Righi, G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Righi, G. (1994) On new and old-known Oligochaeta genera from Paraiba State, Brazil. Revue Suisse de Zoologie, 101, 89 - 106. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. part. 79901

subSubSection.paragraph:
TABLE 1 .
List of useful characters to distinguish species of
Pontoscolex
separated by subgenera, after considerations suggested by Righi (1994) and Borges and Moreno

(1990). P :
Pontoscolex
. Mer. :
Meroscolex
. Mes .:
Mesoscolex
. CS: Common Setae. GS: Genital Setae. n.d.: no data.?: probably present as described. +: data incomplete.

*:
Amputee. **: Diameter measured in pre-clitellar/clitellar/post-clitellar region. AM : Amazonas
. AP: Amapá . PA: Pará . RO: Rondônia . RR: Roraima .
